description.value:
The magic in your blood is unpredictable. When you make your daily preparations, roll [[/r 1d12]] twice and consult the following list:

  1. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Acid Arrow];
  2. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Blur];
  3. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Hideous Laughter];
  4. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Humanoid Form];
  5. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Illusory Object];
  6. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Mirror Image];
  7. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Resist Energy];
  8. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.See Invisibility];
  9. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Shatter];
  10. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Sound Burst];
  11. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Spider Climb];
  12. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Telekinetic Maneuver].

You can cast each of those two spells once during the following day (or one spell twice if you rolled doubles) as 2nd-level divine innate spells.
